H0.text: As well as municipalities, which country is made up of 26 states and one federal district. Argentina

H1.text: As well as municipalities, which country is made up of 26 states and one federal district. Mexico

H2.text: As well as municipalities, which country is made up of 26 states and one federal district. United States

H3.text: As well as municipalities, which country is made up of 26 states and one federal district. Brzil

A4.text: Brazil is a federation composed of 26 states, one federal district, and the 5,571 municipalities.

A5.text: The Senate represents the 26 states and the Federal District.

A6.text: Brazil is divided into federative units which have a certain degree of autonomy (self-government, self-regulation, and self-collection) and are endowed with their own government and constitution. There are 26 states (estados) and one federal district (distrito federal).
